io.artframework

Interface Context

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Scoped
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionContext<TTarget>, ArtContext, ArtObjectContext<TArtObject>, ExecutionContext<TContext>, RequirementContext<TTarget>, TriggerContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArtObjectContext, CombinedArtContext, DefaultActionContext, DefaultArtContext, DefaultExecutionContext, DefaultRequirementContext, DefaultTriggerContext

    public interface Context
extends Scoped

        configuration, scope

    • Method Detail

      • data

        @NonNull
@NonNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data()
        Get all custom data from this Scope.

        All data set like this is non persistent and only exists for the lifetime of this Scoped. Use the StorageProvider to store persistent data.

        This is custom data that was previously set to the context using data(String, Object). Use custom data if you want to pass data to Context objects for a given Scoped.

        Returns:
        The custom data. This is never null

      • data

        default <TValue> java.util.Optional<TValue> data(@NonNull
                                                 @NonNull java.lang.String key,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 TValue value)
        Set some custom data to this Scope.

        All data set like this is non persistent and only exists for the lifetime of this Scoped. Use the StorageProvider to store persistent data.

        Type Parameters:
        TValue - The type of the value
        Parameters:
        key - A key to identify the custom data
        value - The custom data. A null value will remove the entry from the data store.
        Returns:
        The previously set custom data or Optional.empty() if no data was previously set for the given key or if the current data cannot be cast to the new data type.

      • data

        default <TValue> java.util.Optional<TValue> data(java.lang.String key,
                                                 java.lang.Class<TValue> valueClass)
        Get some custom data from this Scope.

        All data set like this is non persistent and only exists for the lifetime of this Scoped. Use the StorageProvider to store persistent data.

        This is custom data that was previously set to the context using data(String, Object). Use custom data if you want to pass data to Context objects for a given Scoped

        Type Parameters:
        TValue - The type of the value
        Parameters:
        key - A key to identify the custom data
        valueClass - The type class of the requested value
        Returns:
        The custom data or Optional.empty() if no such data is contained in this Scope

      • data

        default <TValue> java.util.Optional<TValue> data(Target<?> target,
                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                 TValue value)

      • data

        default <TValue> java.util.Optional<TValue> data(Target<?> target,
